controller

Class AlbumListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AlbumListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Errorable, Logoutable

    public class AlbumListController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Errorable, Logoutable
    AlbumListController is the class for controlling the NonAdminHome. This view is called NonAdminHome.xml. This controls the list of albums of a non-admin user. This controller implements Errorable and Logoutable.
    Author:
    Corentin Rejaud, Julia Sutula
